close_in_age_exemption.details: Less than 10-year age difference for those aged 16-17; less than 4-year age difference for those aged 14-15.

authority_figure_restrictions.details: Sexual contact prohibited between persons in positions of special trust and minors under 18.

legal_notes: Unlawful sexual conduct with a 16-17 year old applies when perpetrator is 10+ years older.
